Home The Basics The game runs pretty differently than Dungeons and Dragons. Here’s some nuggets which summarizes most of the big differences: No turns are taken, we play conversationally. The GM doesn’t roll dice very often. Some things give you Armor, which just subtracts from any damage dealt (unless the damage ignores Armor). Fighting groups of enemies, they don’t all roll damage. Instead, the strongest enemy rolls damage, and for each additional enemy, they just add +1 damage to the final total.
